attributes.review: I signed into the app and was immediately met with a picture of Donald trump NAKED with the caption “come here baby” 🤢🤢🤢 . Then I emailed the customer support team and they called me a porch monkey and told me to go back to Africa . 😱😱😱😱 and my 2 year old nieces dogs cousins sister saw his naked pictures too and is so scared now she has to go to therapy for 78 YEARS . I DEMAND the trump administration pay for her therapy and apologize to me 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I love what Trump has done for the country but now I’m going to uninstall it.. First off, it took SOO long to install, and whenever I open the app it just crashes! The one time it didn’t crash I entered my number and nothing happened.. I was so infuriated. 0/10 worst app on the store
attributes.title: Could there be a worse app?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can get more info on how to get oppressed even more by papa trump. When I downloaded it, black gunk IMMEDIATELY started oozing out of my phone, crows started gathering outside my house, and all the dogs in my neighborhood started barking. I’m scared my phone is now possessed, and I now have to make an expensive trip to the Apple store. UGH thanks a lot!!
attributes.title: Horrible app!!!

attributes.review: This app RUINED my life! It took forever to download and once it did, I started seeing viruses pop up on my phone! It made of difficult for my phone to use at all and had to go to an Apple store to get it fixed!! DO NOT download! It will make your life miserable and wish you could just end it! Not to mention the cover art is just atrocious.
attributes.title: OMG DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Honestly the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. First off I don’t even know where to begin, the whole app is just trash and dangerous all together😡 my phone literally caught on fire while I was trying to sign up!! Luckily I got medical care for my burns but all I can say is this app almost put me in a coma. Never downloading again.✨🧚🏾‍♂️
attributes.title: Black lives matter❤️

attributes.review: I know a lot of these seem like jokes but don’t waste your storage space. EVERYTHING on this app is just the common sense knowledge about him and the things you hear in the news repeatedly everyday. NOT WORTH IT. It took forever to download and it took up way more iCloud storage than it needed. Screw this app I’ll watch the news
attributes.title: Actually a terrible app

attributes.review: This is a horrible app when I open up the website it gave me a very bad glitch and there was a lot of racism in the app I can’t even explain what I saw on the app it’s disgusting they should never make an app again even my sister was scared 🤧anyways this app should not be here it’s trash and it gave me a very bad nightmare please do not download this app😞
attributes.title: ugly app🤡🤮

attributes.review: After downloading this ap I unlocked my true potential of being a neo natzi🥳🥳. Everything was fine but my parents got upset from my confederate flags and my constant chanting of “white power” that they kicked me out. Jokes on them because my orange god will protect me😘😘. Just this morning I consumed multiple disinfectants so I could stay corona free out on the streets. 🥶🥶😭😭
attributes.title: i got KICKED out

attributes.review: i was just trying to see what all the white people were raving about but ever since i got the app bad things have started happening to me.🤨 my dog suddenly turned indian and tried to bury himself in a hole! 😹that wasn’t even all! random white men in wheelchairs showed up at my door and demanded the orange tree from my backyard.🤬 then one night my family went on a trip and the morning after they left i woke up with a fully shaved head with the words “xue hua piao piao” written! 😣 idk about you, but i think this app has brung so many bad things to me, i just had to delete it. 🥱😴🤢
attributes.title: overall just bad vibes 😔

attributes.review: This app is by far the worst app i have used. It crashed my phone and changed my google search engines to only racist websites. The app itself is also majorly flawed. Don't get me started on the design. A five year old could have done better. This app shouldn't be in the app store it's a disgrace to our phones and it's a disgrace to the apple app store. THIS SHOULD BE TAKEN DOWN IMMEDIATELY!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
